document_data.name: ''Tome of Shaping Secrets''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Tome of Shaping Secrets''''' was a [[spellbook]] of the [[College of Shaping Magics]].
document_data.Powers: This book contained all the [[ritual]]s that were taught by the College of Shaping Magics, as well as all the [[spell]]s they taught to aid in the creation of [[magic item]]s. These included ''[[binding]]'', ''[[contact other plane]]'', ''[[enchant an item]]'', ''[[guards and wards]]'', ''[[limited wish]]'', ''[[permanency]]'', ''[[stone shape]]'', ''[[temporal stasis]]'', ''[[truename]]'', and a ritual equivalent of ''[[flesh to stone]]''.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]],{{ShatteredStatue-Time}} a group of [[adventurer]]s from [[Suzail]] were seeking out the scattered remains of [[Awtawmatawn]] on behalf of [[Amelior Amanitas]]. As part of this quest they investigated the ruined [[Temple of the Dragon Oracle]] and within a pit guarded by a [[dragonwight]] they came across this book within a stone box that had been ''[[wizard lock]]ed''.Through it is not outright stated in the adventure, it's heavily implied that this copy of the spellbook was likely placed here within this box by [[Valmous|Valmous the Shaper]].
